original: Lantz, Bror Arwid, redaktör. Mjölby, f. 29/9/83 i Risinge, östergötl. 1., av byggm. Carl Johan L. o. Eva Sofia Carlsson. G. 17 m. Stina Netzler. Barn: Ake f. 18, löjtn. v. Värml. reg., Margaretha 21, g. m. ing. Gunnar
translated: Lantz, Bror Arwid, editor. Mjölby, born on September 29, 1883 in Risinge, Östergötland, son of construction worker Carl Johan L. and Eva Sofia Carlsson. Married in 1917 to Stina Netzler. Children: Ake, born in 1918, lieutenant in the Värmland regiment; Margaretha, born in 1921, married to engineer Gunnar.
